data.system_settings: ASUS Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: A progress bar with just a loading line appears and after some time uploads the file completely without going through the "real time updates" phase
data.expected_result: A progress bar with real time updates should be visible
data.short_description: Progress bar doesn't show while uploading .mp4 and .gif files
data.steps_to_repro: - Don't have lightning fast internet, for you to view the bug you need to have somewhat slow internet otherwise the progress bar will be visible only for a fraction of a second - Go to a channel /DM and upload a somewhat large gif  or mp4 file   - Observe the progress bar
